title: Respond to an application
caption: Respond to an application
p2: If you have any objections or responses to their application you must send them to the tribunal as soon as possible and by
p3: If you need more time to respond, you may request more time from the tribunal. If you do not respond or request more time to respond, the tribunal will consider the application without your response.

bullets.li1: If you agree with the application or not
bullets.li3: If you want to apply for a hearing to discuss your response

details.p1: If you need legal help or advice before responding, use the Law Society to find legal professionals.
details.p2: Search for legal professionals in England and Wales (opens in new tab).
details.p3: Search for legal professionals in Scotland (opens in new tab).

legend: What do you want to tell or ask the tribunal?
copyCorrespondence: Do you want to copy this correspondence to the other party to satisfy the Rules of Procedure?
textInputLabel: What's your response to the application?
textInputHint: Use this box to provide your answer or you can upload material at the next step.
radioButtonHint: Do you have any supporting material you want to provide?
Claimant not complied: Tell the tribunal the claimant has not complied
Order a witness to attend to give eviden: Order a witness to attend to give evidence
Strike out all or part of a claim: Strike out all or part of a claim

hasSupportingMaterial.required: Tell us if you also want to upload supporting material?

responseText.required: Provide details of your response &/or upload supporting material
responseText.requiredFile: Provide details of your response &/or upload a file
responseText.tooLong: Response details must be 2500 characters or less
